intro.speaker: Kai
intro.text: Engine's hot. Let's melt some asphalt.

intro.speaker: Vera
intro.text: Your engine is inefficient, Takeda. I've already calculated the optimal path.

alien_abduction_start.speaker: Kai
alien_abduction_start.text: What the—!? What IS that thing!?

alien_abduction_start.speaker: Vera
alien_abduction_start.text: Gravitational anomaly detected. This defies all known physics.

alien_ship_interior.speaker: Kai
alien_ship_interior.text: Where are we? This place is giving me the creeps.

alien_ship_interior.speaker: Vera
alien_ship_interior.text: Bio-organic architecture. Whoever built this isn't from Earth.

alien_ship_interior.speaker: Kai
alien_ship_interior.text: Look, I don't care who they are. We need to find a way out.

alien_ship_interior.speaker: Vera
alien_ship_interior.text: Agreed. For once, Takeda, we work together.

alien_ship_interior.speaker: Kai
alien_ship_interior.text: ...Yeah. Let's wreck this thing and go home.

alien_queen_battle.speaker: System
alien_queen_battle.text: [A MASSIVE ALIEN QUEEN EMERGES FROM THE CHAMBER]

alien_queen_battle.speaker: Vera
alien_queen_battle.text: That's... the core intelligence. We need to destroy it!

alien_queen_battle.speaker: Kai
alien_queen_battle.text: I'll take the left tentacles, you take the right!

alien_queen_battle.speaker: Vera
alien_queen_battle.text: Acknowledged. Don't get yourself killed, Takeda.

mall_drop_start.speaker: Vera
mall_drop_start.text: Brace for impact! Aim for the roof!

mall_drop_start.speaker: System
mall_drop_start.text: [CRASH! YOU BURST THROUGH THE MALL ROOF]

mall_drop_start.speaker: Kai
mall_drop_start.text: Ow... where did my weapon go?

mall_drop_start.speaker: Vera
mall_drop_start.text: Mine too. We're unarmed in hostile territory.

mall_drop_start.speaker: Mall Cop
mall_drop_start.text: FREEZE! You're under arrest for property damage!

mall_drop_start.speaker: Kai
mall_drop_start.text: No time for this! Vera, grab that!

mall_interior.speaker: Kai
mall_interior.text: This mall is huge! How do we get out?

mall_interior.speaker: Vera
mall_interior.text: Emergency exits should be on the east side. Follow me.

mall_interior.speaker: Kai
mall_interior.text: Since when do you memorize mall blueprints?

mall_interior.speaker: Vera
mall_interior.text: I memorize everything, Takeda. It's called being prepared.

mystery_reveal_1.speaker: Kai
mystery_reveal_1.text: Wait... Vera. Those aliens. They had the Academy emblem on them.

mystery_reveal_1.speaker: Vera
mystery_reveal_1.text: ...I noticed. Someone at the Academy is behind this.

mystery_reveal_1.speaker: Kai
mystery_reveal_1.text: Who would summon aliens? And why?

mystery_reveal_1.speaker: Vera
mystery_reveal_1.text: Unknown. But we need to investigate. Together.

confrontation_director.speaker: Director
confrontation_director.text: Ah, Kai Takeda and Vera Vector. My two finest students.

confrontation_director.speaker: Kai
confrontation_director.text: Cut the act, Director. You sent those aliens after us!

confrontation_director.speaker: Director
confrontation_director.text: Not after you. I needed to test your... compatibility.

confrontation_director.speaker: Director
confrontation_director.text: The Midnight Exam was never about racing. It's about finding the perfect pair to pilot... The Titan.

confrontation_director.speaker: Vera
confrontation_director.text: A dual-pilot mech. Legends say it was built to defend Neo-Tokyo.

confrontation_director.speaker: Director
confrontation_director.text: Correct. And you two are the only ones who can synchronize with it.

titan_awakening.speaker: Vera
titan_awakening.text: 75 meters tall. Nuclear-powered. Armed with plasma weaponry.

titan_awakening.speaker: Director
titan_awakening.text: The aliens were the first wave. A true threat approaches Neo-Tokyo.

titan_awakening.speaker: Kai
titan_awakening.text: Then we'll stop it. Right, Vera?

final_battle_start.speaker: Kai
final_battle_start.text: Synchronization at 98%. Let's light this thing up!

final_battle_start.speaker: Vera
final_battle_start.text: Kai... if we don't make it—

final_battle_start.speaker: Kai
final_battle_start.text: We will. I trust you, Vera.

victory_ending.speaker: System
victory_ending.text: [THE MOTHERSHIP EXPLODES IN A BRILLIANT FLASH]

victory_ending.speaker: Kai
victory_ending.text: WE DID IT! VERA, WE ACTUALLY DID IT!

victory_ending.speaker: Kai
victory_ending.text: Hey, Vera... about that race. Want to call it a tie?

victory_ending.speaker: System
victory_ending.text: CONGRATULATIONS! You've completed Neo-Tokyo: Rival Academies!

side_quest_hacker.speaker: Mysterious Figure
side_quest_hacker.text: Pssst. You two. Need some extra firepower?

side_quest_hacker.speaker: Hacker
side_quest_hacker.text: Name's Ghost. I can upgrade your gear... for a price.

side_quest_hacker.speaker: Hacker
side_quest_hacker.text: Data shards. Bring me 10, and I'll make you unstoppable.

side_quest_lost_student.speaker: Student
side_quest_lost_student.text: Help! I'm lost in the mall!

side_quest_lost_student.speaker: Kai
side_quest_lost_student.text: How did you even get here?

side_quest_lost_student.speaker: Student
side_quest_lost_student.text: I followed you through the portal! I thought it was cool!

side_quest_lost_student.speaker: Vera
side_quest_lost_student.text: *sighs* Stay behind us. We'll get you out.

shard_1.title: The First Race
shard_1.content: Legend says the first Midnight Exam wasn't a race, but a riot. Students from all academies clashed on the rooftops, and only the fastest survived.

shard_2.title: The Academies
shard_2.content: Neo-Tokyo has five rival academies: Crimson Engine, Vector Logic, Azure Shield, Neon Phantom, and Obsidian Tower. Each trains students in different combat philosophies.

shard_3.title: The Titan Project
shard_3.content: Built 20 years ago by the Academy Council, The Titan was designed as Neo-Tokyo's ultimate defense weapon. It requires two pilots with perfect synchronization to operate.

shard_4.title: The Alien Incursion
shard_4.content: The first alien sighting was 6 months ago. The Academy covered it up, claiming it was a 'training exercise.' Few know the truth.

shard_5.title: Kai Takeda's Past
shard_5.content: Kai lost his parents in a race accident years ago. He vowed to become the fastest racer in Neo-Tokyo to honor their memory.

shard_6.title: Vera Vector's Secret
shard_6.content: Vera is not fully human. She was created in a lab as the perfect pilot—cold, calculating, and unbeatable. Or so she thought.

shard_7.title: The Director's Plan
shard_7.content: Director Kurogane orchestrated the entire Midnight Exam as a selection process for Titan pilots. The aliens were a test of combat synchronization.

shard_8.title: The Mothership
shard_8.content: The aliens didn't come to invade. They came to warn us. Something far worse is coming—something that could destroy Neo-Tokyo and the entire planet.

trust_vera.condition: Player chooses to trust Vera during alien ship escape
